EmailTemplate.name: IPM Notify Finance Leader about TLD is changed in Rollout Project
EmailTemplate.subject: Attention Target Launch Date is changed for {!IPM_Project_Rollout__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The Target Launch Date for {!IPM_Project_Rollout__c.Name} has been updated to {!IPM_Project_Rollout__c.Target_Launch_Date__c} from {!IPM_Project_Rollout__c.Previous_Target_Launch_Date__c}.
